name: Analamanga Hill Loop
description: Scenic sunrise climb circling the Queen's Palace ridge with sweeping city views. Expect crisp air, rolling hills, and tight switchbacks.
tips: Run medium regen on descents to avoid brake fade.
Stop at Andohalo plaza for battery check and photos.
Cobblestone sections near the cathedral require 35 PSI tire pressure.

name: Canal Greenway Sprint
description: Flat twilight ride hugging the northern canal. Ideal for newer riders who want to practice group formation and night lighting setups.
tips: Bring reflective vest; sunset glare along the canal is strong.
We pause at Kilometer 6 to tune lighting animations.
Packed gravel section favours wider tires at 28-30 PSI.

name: Lemur Trail Express
description: Adventure ride into the wooded eastern ridge with tight tree runs and wildlife spotting. Bring spare belts, water, and light snacks.
tips: Switch to hill mode before the first ascent at Km 4.
Boardwalk segments are slick pre-dawn; run eco throttle.
Carry bug spray and a compact toolkit for quick fixes.
